en.question: 1. What is your nationality?
en.name: nationality

en.question: 2. What is your gender?
en.name: gender

en.question: 3. What laguages do you speak?
en.name: languages

en.question: 4. How long have you been at this camp?
en.name: howLong

en.question: 5. Has the Elpis service facilitated your life in the camp?
en.name: impact

en.question: 6. How often do you use the service?
en.name: impact

en.question: 7. What barriers do you face in using our service?
en.name: barriers

en.question: 8. How often do you have access to the internet?
en.name: accessToInternet

en.question: 9. How much do you currently pay for internet access?
en.name: internetAccessPrice

en.question: 10. What mobile network provider do you use?
en.name: networkProvider

en.question: 11. Which services on our digital platform did you use the most apart from charging your phone?
en.name: services

en.question: 12. What time of day do you access this service?
en.name: timeOfTheDay

en.question: 13. What could we do to improve this service? (Let us know what kind of services you would like to see on here).
en.name: improvements

en.question: 14. Quality of Service (Overall User Experience)*
en.name: overallExp

en.question: 15. User interface*
en.name: userInterface

en.question: 16. Signal range*
en.name: signalRange

en.question: 17. Quality of Arabic translation*
en.name: translationQuality

en.question: 18. Location of Solar Hub*
en.name: hubLocation

en.question: 19. Quality of content*
en.name: contentQuality

en.question: 20. Depth of content*
en.name: contentDepth
